testcase.name: To Test the payment of the Moisturizer purchased
testcase.system-out: Given Current temperature page loads successfully...........................passed When Curren temperature value is displayed to the user......................passed Then user should be able to click on the purchase button for Moisturizer....passed Then user should be able to click on the Add button for lowest price of Aloe.passed Then user should be able to click on the Add button for lowest price of Almond.passed Then user should be able to click on the Cart button to navigate to check out page.passed And user should validate the sum of the items with the total sum............passed When user click on the Pay with card button.................................passed Then user validates that the payment pop up is displayed....................passed Then user should input the values for email,card number,monthyear and cvv...passed Then user should click on the payment button and payment success message should be displayed.passed
